title: karuNakaranE shiva
sahitya:
karuNakaranE shiva shankaranE gati vErillai IshA kapAlI


anupallavi

  para shivanE kalpakAmbikai prANa patiyE shambhO pashupatiyE aDiyAr paNi


caraNam    ettanai vidamO kattinEn kadarinEn Ezhai shol ambalam ErAdadEn
bhaktaraik-kAkkum aruTkaDal nIyE pAvi enrenai veruttAl pughal EdaiyA
